content.rendered:
About This Service

Alcoholics Anonymous has over 118,000 groups across 182 countries. Individuals may find information about in-person meetings through an online search tool.

About the Provider

Alcoholics Anonymous is an international fellowship of men and women who have had a drinking problem. It is nonprofessional, self-supporting, multiracial, apolitical, and available almost everywhere.

Other Info

Website: https://www.aa.org/pages/en_US/find-aa-resources

excerpt.rendered: Support groups for those struggling to control their drinking.
